Review Name: Mind-blowing purchase Review Description: Ordered on 22nd of May and got delivered on 28th May. I got it for a superb price of 35000rs. Installation got delayed and was done on 4th june. Delivery is good, but the guy came for installation was professional. He did it very nice and charged us 1000rs as mentioned in Flipkart. Pros: Looks cool and simple Cooling is quick and uniform Hcool option is in next level. No con except the backlight for remote
